summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3041 for the improvement of Fourteenth Avenue South, from Dallas Avenue to Director Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 36661, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
